personal data protection is a fundamental right of everyone and we should all work towards preserving it.

the european union has taken serious steps towards protecting the personal information of its citizens. the general data protection regulation (gdpr) is one such example which aims to ensure that individuals have more control over their data and how it's being used by organizations.

it is important for social media platforms like twitter to prioritize the protection of user data. companies must be transparent about how they collect, use, and share personal information with third parties. users should have the right to choose what information is being shared and with whom.
